wikipedia_page.main: Richard Broxton Onians (1899 - 1986) was a classicist and Hildred Carlile Professor of Latin in the University of London. His major publication was The Origins of European Thought: About the Body, the Mind, the Soul, the World, Time and Fate (Cambridge UP, 1951).

response: He is the son of the distinguished classicist, Richard Broxton Onians.
